text: Susan Dey (December 10, 1952 in Pekin, Illinois) is an American actress. She acts mostly in television programs. She portrayed Laurie Partridge in the series The Partridge Family and received a Golden Globe Award for acting as Grace Van Owen in the series L.A. Law. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Illinois Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Susan Dey
